name.japanese: パンクハザード - 破壊された研究所

description: A destroyed laboratory facility on Punk Hazard where the Straw Hats take shelter with the kidnapped children. This is where the Yeti Cool Brothers launch their assassination attempt.

keyEvents.title: Yeti Cool Brothers Arrive
keyEvents.description: The legendary assassins Rock and Scotch arrive at the destroyed laboratory to eliminate the Straw Hats.
keyEvents.significance: The location becomes a battleground between the Straw Hats and Caesar's assassins.

keyEvents.title: Brownbeard's Death
keyEvents.description: Brownbeard is betrayed and killed by Scotch at this location.
keyEvents.significance: The destroyed lab witnesses Brownbeard's tragic death, marking a dark moment in the arc.

keyEvents.title: Battle with Yeti Cool Brothers
keyEvents.description: The Yeti Cool Brothers launch their assault on the Straw Hats at the destroyed laboratory.
keyEvents.significance: Major battle location for this portion of the Punk Hazard arc.

statusHistory.reason: Laboratory was destroyed prior to the Straw Hats' arrival

description: An abandoned island in the New World, formerly a government research facility. The island is split between a burning hot side and a frozen cold side due to a battle between Akainu and Aokiji. Caesar Clown uses it as his base for illegal experiments.

keyEvents.title: Law's Arrival at Punk Hazard
keyEvents.description: Flashback reveals how Trafalgar Law first arrived at Punk Hazard seeking refuge from Caesar Clown.
keyEvents.significance: Establishes the history of Law's presence on the island and his deal with Caesar.

statusHistory.reason: Island is currently being used by Caesar Clown for experiments
